# Integration Standards & Guidelines

> Documentation for standardized API, Event, Files, Data Views, MCP, A2A integrations, and more.

## Mandatory Standards
- [API Naming](standards/api-naming.md): Strict URL and method rules.
- [RFC Compliance](standards/rfc-compliance.md): Mandatory data formats.

## Guidelines & Best Practices
- [Event Design](guidelines/event-design.md): How to structure Kafka events.
- [Pagination](guidelines/pagination.md): Recommended ways to handle large datasets.
